channel.title: Help with server
channel.description: so i start server , hit run , everything seems okay, so i go to client ,and try to log in , and it dont let me in , some sources work fine , others dont , wheres the problem ?

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Make sure your client is connecting *to localhost (0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1) and is using your serverâ€™s port. The default port is 43594.

Read full topic
